item.title: Mod plz lock this
item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

[quote=“ThatOneServer, post:12, topic:210520”][quote author=Got Java? link=topic=277382.msg2260991#msg2260991 date=1212713635]

Why the fuck would you test candy on animals? I’ll hope that video explains why or else I will hate PETA even more.

Edit: Well fuck PETA anyways, I will enjoy my mars even more now. These tests are needed to see what happens. Maybe this particular test could be performed on humans, but many can’t without killing the one tested on.

Does PETA want to ban all animal tests? If they do, do they wanna test on humans?
[/quote]Here are some alternatives to animals currently used:

[ul][li]“Synthetic skin,” called Corrositex[/li]
[li]Computer modeling[/li]
[li]Improved statistical design[/li][/ul]

STFU, if you don’t know what you’re talking about…

candy companies don’t test skin[/quote]hahahaa xD <3google

Read full topic
